verses.1: Leviʼ tapate: Gershom, Kohath le Merari ahi uh hi.
verses.2: Kohathʼ tapate: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel ahi uh hi.
verses.3: Amramʼ tate: Aaron, Moses le tanu Miriam ahi uh hi. Aaronʼ tapate: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar ahi uh hi.
verses.4: Eleazarʼ suanlekhakte: A tapa Finehas, a tapa Abishua,
verses.5: a tapa Bukki, a tapa Uzzi,
verses.6: a tapa Zerahiah, a tapa Meraioth,
verses.7: a tapa Amariah, a tapa Ahitub,
verses.8: a tapa Zadok, a tapa Ahimaaz,
verses.9: a tapa Azariah, a tapa Johanan,
verses.10: le a tapa Azariah, (Solomon in Jerusalem ah a lam inn sungah siampi a sem pa) ahi hi.
verses.11: Azariahʼ tapa Amariah, a tapa Ahitub,
verses.12: a tapa Zadok, a tapa Shalum,
verses.13: a tapa Hikiah, a tapa Azariah,
verses.14: a tapa Seraiah, a tapa Jehozadak ahi hi.
verses.15: Topa in Nebukhadnezzarʼ khut tawh Judah le Jerusalem salin a mat ciangin Jehozadak zong salin a pai hi.
verses.16: Leviʼ tapate: Gershom, Kohath le Merari ahi uh hi.
verses.17: Gershomʼ tapate: Libni le Shimei ahi uh hi.
verses.18: Kohathʼ tapate: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel ahi uh hi.
verses.19: Merariʼ tapate: Mahli le Mushi ahi uh hi. Hihte amauʼ beh tawh kizui-in Levi minamte ahi uh hi.
verses.20: Gershomʼ suante: A tapa Libni, a tapa Jahath, a tapa Zimmah,
verses.21: a tapa Joah, a tapa Iddo, a tapa Zerah, a tapa Jeatherai ahi hi.
verses.22: Kohathʼ suante: A tapa Amminadab, a tapa Korah, a tapa Assir,
verses.23: a tapa Ekanah, a tapa Ebiasaf, a tapa Assir,
verses.24: a tapa Tahath, a tapa Uriel, a tapa Uzziah le a tapa Shaul ahi hi.
verses.25: Elkanahʼ tapate: Amasai le Ahimoth ahi hi.
verses.26: Ahimothʼ suante: A tapa Elkanah, a tapa Zofai, a tapa Nahath,
verses.27: a tapa Eliab, a tapa Jeroham, a tapa Ekanah, a tapa Samuel ahi uh hi.
verses.28: Samuelʼ tapate: A tacil Joel, a nihna Abijah ahi uh hi.
verses.29: Merariʼ suante: Mahli, a tapa Libni, a tapa Shimei, a tapa Uzza,
verses.30: a tapa Shimea, a tapa Haggiah le a tapa Asaiah ahi uh hi.
verses.31: Topaʼ biakbuk sungah Thuciamna Singkuang a tawlngak khit ciangin tua sungah la sak nasep a ukin David in a koih hih mite ahi hi.
verses.32: Solomon in Jerusalem ah Topaʼ Biakinn a lam ciang dong amaute in kikhopna puanbuk ahi biakbuk mai ah la sak na sem uh a, amaute in a nasep uh a hunhun a banbanin sem uh hi.
verses.33: Hih nasep a semteʼ khangsimna a nuai-a bang ahi hi. Kohath mite beh sung panin: Heman la makai pa hi a, Joelʼ tapa ahi hi. Hemanʼ khangsimna pen a pupi Israel lam manawhin kileh sim to hi. Heman a pa Joel, a pa Samuel,
verses.34: a pa Ekanah, a pa Jehoram, a pa Eliel, a pa Toah,
verses.35: a pa Zuf, a pa Ekanah, a pa Mahath, a pa Amasai,
verses.36: a pa Ekanah, a pa Joel, a pa Azariah, a pa Zefaniah,
verses.37: a pa Tahath, a pa Assir, a pa Ebiasaf, a pa Korah,
verses.38: a pa Izhar, a pa Kohath, a pa Levi, a pa Israel ahi hi.
verses.39: Asaf pen lasa pawl nihna a makai pa hi a, ama khangsimna a pupi Levi lam manawhin kileh sim to hi. Tuate in: Asaf, a pa Berekhiah, a pa Shimea,
verses.40: a pa Mikhael, a pa Baaseiah, a pa Makhijah,
verses.41: a pa Ethni, a pa Zerah, a pa Adaiah,
verses.42: a pa Ethan, a pa Zimmah, a pa Shimei,
verses.43: a pa Jahath, a pa Gershom, a pa Levi ahi uh hi.
verses.44: Merari-te beh sung panin Ethan pen lasa pawl thumna a ukpa hi a, ama khangsimna a pupi Levi lam manawhin kileh sim to hi. Tuate in: Ethan, a pa Kishi, a pa Abdi, a pa Malluk,
verses.45: a pa Hashabiah, a pa Amaziah, a pa Hikiah,
verses.46: a pa Amzi, a pa Bani, a pa Shemer,
verses.47: a pa Mahli, a pa Mushi, a pa Levi hi a,
verses.48: Levi mi a sanggamte uh Pasianʼ biakbuk nasep dang khempeuh a sem dingin a kisehte ahi hi.
verses.49: Aaron le a tapate in Pasianʼ nasem Mosesʼ thupiak sate khempeuh bangin siangtho pen mun nasepnate khempeuh le Israel mite adingin kilemna a bawl dingin meihal biakna tau tung le paknamtui biakna tau tungah piakna a bawl uh hi.
verses.50: Aaronʼ suanlekhakte: Aaron a tapa Eleazar, a tapa Finehas, a tapa Abishua,
verses.51: a tapa Bukki, a tapa Uzzi, a tapa Zerahiah,
verses.52: a tapa Meraioth, a tapa Amariah, a tapa Ahitub,
verses.53: a tapa Zadok, a tapa Ahimaaz ahi hi.
verses.54: Amauʼ gamgi huam sungah amauʼ teenna tawh kizui-in amauʼ omna munte: Kohath-te beh sung pan Aaron suante tungah a kipia, amau adingin a tanh uh om a,
verses.55: Judah gam sungah Hebron le a kiim lo nonate amaute tungah pia uh a,
verses.56: ahih hangin a lote le a khuaneute Jefunnehʼ tapa Kaleb tungah a pia uh hi.
verses.57: Aaron suante tungah amaute in a piak khuapite: Bukna khuapi Hebron, Jattir le Libnah khuapite, Eshtemoa a lo nona gamte tawh,
verses.58: Hilen a lo nona gamte tawh, Debir a lo nona gamte tawh,
verses.59: Ashan a lo nona gamte tawh le Beth-shemesh a lo nona gamte tawh ahi hi.
verses.60: Tua ciangin Benjamin minamteʼ gam sung panin Geba a lo nona gamte tawh, Alemeth a lo nona gamte tawh le Anathoth a lo nona gamte tawh ahi hi. Amauʼ beh khempeuhʼ khuapite sawm le thum ahi hi.
verses.61: Kohath mi a omlaite tungah aisanna tawh Manasseh minam a langteʼ gam sung panin khuapi sawm kipia hi.
verses.62: Gershom-te beh tungah a innkuan a kizui-in Issakhar-teʼ gam, Asher-teʼ gam, Naftali-teʼ gam le Bashan-a om Manasseh-teʼ gam sung panin khuapi sawm le thum kipia hi.
verses.63: Merari-te beh tungah a innkuan a kizui-in Reuben-teʼ gam, Gad-teʼ gam le Zebulun-teʼ gam sung panin khuapi sawm le nih kipia hi.
verses.64: Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite in hih bangin Levi mite tungah khuapite a lo nonate tawh a pia uh hi.
verses.65: Amaute in Judah-teʼ gam, Simeon-teʼ gam le Benjamin-teʼ gam sung panin zong a minin a kilo hih khuapite amaute tungah a pia uh hi.
verses.66: Tua ciangin Kohath-te beh pawl khat in Efraim minamteʼ gam sung panin amauʼ gam khuapite mah ngah uh hi.
verses.67: Amaute tungah a kipia bukna khuapite: Efraim mual tung gam sungah a om Shekhem a lo nona gamte tawh, Gezer a lo nona gamte tawh,
verses.68: Jokmeam a lo nona gamte tawh, Beth-horon a lo nona gamte tawh,
verses.69: Aijalon a lo nona gamte tawh, Gath-rimmon a lo nona gamte tawh,
verses.70: le Manasseh minam a langteʼ gam sung panin Aner a lo nona gamte tawh le Bileam a lo nona gamte tawh hi a, hihte pen Kohath-te beh a omlaite ading ahi hi.
verses.71: Manasseh minam a langteʼ gam sung panin Gershom-te beh tungah a kipiate: Bashan gam sunga Golan a lo nona gamte tawh le Ashtaroth a lo nona gamte tawh ahi hi.
verses.72: Tua ciangin Issakhar-teʼ gam sung panin: Kedesh a lo nona gamte tawh, Daberath a lo nona gamte tawh,
verses.73: Ramoth a lo nona gamte tawh le Anem a lo nona gamte tawh ahi hi.
verses.74: Asher-teʼ gam sung panin: Mashal a lo nona gamte tawh, Abdon a lo nona gamte tawh,
verses.75: Hukok a lo nona gamte tawh le Rehob a lo nona gamte tawh ahi hi.
verses.76: Tua ciangin Naftali-teʼ gam sung panin: Galilee gam sungah a om Kedesh a lo nona gamte tawh, Hammon a lo nona gamte tawh le Kiriathaim a lo nona gamte tawh ahi hi.
verses.77: Merari-te beh a omlaite tungah Zebulun-teʼ gam sung panin a kipiate: Rimmono a lo nona gamte tawh, Tabor a lo nona gamte tawh,
verses.78: le Reuben-teʼ gam sung panin Jordan nisuahna lam, Jerikho kiang Jordan gal khat sung pan: Pawn a om Bezer a lo nona gamte tawh, Jahzah a lo nona gamte tawh,
verses.79: Kedemoth a lo nona gamte tawh le Mefaath a lo nona gamte tawh ahi hi.
verses.80: Tua ciangin Gad-teʼ sung panin: Gilead gam a om Ramoth a lo nona gamte tawh, Mahanaim a lo nona gamte tawh,
verses.81: Heshbon a lo nona gamte tawh le Jazer a lo nona gamte tawh ahi hi.
